title: Commit to Your LD
report: Commit for 2019 to connect with your LD. Attend the monthly meetings and get involved. We need to work in 2019 to make 2020 happen! Click on the link above and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find the monthly meeting dates and how you can help. All LDs have many opportunities for volunteering.

title: Support AZ DLCC
description: Help elect Democrats in the AZ House and Senate.
report: Help Democrats gain the majority in 2020. Republicans control both chambers of the AZ state legislature, but we're here to change that. Click on the link above and sign up today. Join us-The work for 2020 has already begun.

title: Request to Speak
report: 2020 Legislative Session!Are you signed up for the Request to Speak (RTS; and you don't really have to speak!) system and Civic Engagement Beyond Voting's (CEBV) newsletter?Learn how to use RTS to weigh in on bills, and receive the weekly newsletter. Click on the link above.

title: Register Voters
report: Help register new voters from your home! All you need is a computer, printer, envelopes, stamps and a willingness to spend some time to make a difference. Click on the link and help Vote Forward with their proven approach to getting more Democrats registered and voting!

title: Flip Arizona
report: We are partnering with Flip AZ to guarantee a Democratic win in 2020. Because Trump won by only 3 points in 2016, we are confident that a push to register Democratic voters in AZ will flip our state Blue. Join us! Click on the link to register

title: Support Mark Kelly
report: We will send a second Democratic Senator to Congress when we help to elect Mark Kelly. Give money, give time, give support. Click on the link above.

title: Write Postcards
report: We are asking volunteers to commit to writing at least 50 postcards. We provide the postcards, script, and you provide the stamps. We are specifically writing the postcards to remind Dems to get on the early Voter List.Click on the link or email Ephraim at einfante@azdem.org to get started!

title: Put Up Yard Signs
report: Excited to show your neighbors how much you support State Senate candidate Christine Marsh, Rep. Aaron Lieberman, and Rep. Kelli Butler? Fill out this form to order your own yard signs for 2020! Want to help deliver and install signs? Contact lrodriguez@azdem.org!

title: Help Elect Dems
report: LD28 is one of the most competitive districts in AZ. We need to elect 2016 AZ Teacher of the Year Christine Marsh to flip the AZ State Senate! Join Christine Marsh, Rep. Kelli Butler, and Rep. Aaron Lieberman as we phone bank.Don't worry if you haven't phone banked before, we include a full training. Contact Tyler Kowch (602-321-7290) with any questions.

title: Text Voters
report: Help us text voters in LD28 to sign them up for the mail-in ballot! Sign up here to join us for training and text bank from 2-3 pm on Sunday, July 19th or 4-5pm on Tuesday, July 21st. Help turn AZ Blue!

title: Text Voters
report: Join us via Zoom on Sun, July 26th at 1pm to send text messages to Dems in LD 28. We'll ask them for a pledge to vote for Christine Marsh, Aaron Lieberman, and Kelli Butler! Relational organizing is one of the most effective ways to earn votes for our candidates. Our goal is to get 100 pledges to vote; hope you can help us meet this goal!

title: Be part of Hamilton!
report: Join us on Saturday, August 8th @ 5:30pm (MST) for a live performance and live Q&A with the reigning Broadway cast of Hamilto!Calls and/or donations made between July 25th through August 4th will get you a ticket to this big event! Don't throw away your shot to join in on the fun!

title: ActNowAZ
description: Click here for a simple explanation of how the ActNowAZ App works!
report: Every Tuesday, your iPhone or iPad will ping with a notification of a specific way that we can help to deliver for Democrats in 2020. Open the App and you will have your action for the week. And, the actions and ideas for previous weeks will remain open, so check them out, too. Join us and make your voice heard and your actions matter.
